DOC.brief_summary: The aim study compare Web-based system computer telephone system determine effectiveness improve diet behavior compare control group .
DOC.brief_title: Improving Dietary Behavior Through Tailored Messages
DOC.detailed_description: The aim study compare Web-based system ( WEB-DIET ) computer telephone system ( TLC [ Telephone Linked Communications ] -DIET ) affect dietary behavior change . These intervention target dietary behavior ( consumption fat fruit vegetable ) . The behavior change strategy content derive behavior change theory ( Transtheoretical Model [ TTM ] ) . A representative sample ~1200 adult large urban area recruit list-assisted telephone list buy University Rhode Island subject randomize one three group : Web-based system ( WEB- DIET ) , computer telephone system ( TLC [ Telephone Linked Communications ] -DIET ) , assessment control . The study hypothesis , evaluated end 6-month intervention period end 18-month follow-up ( post-baseline ) observation period , : 1 . TLC-DIET > Control 2 . WEB-DIET > Control 3 . WEB-DIET > TLC-DIET .
DOC.criteria: 18 year age old Be risk regard saturate fat Have access basic computer hardware software Use Internet regularly ( define 1 time per week ) basic proficiency Read speak English fifth grade level Have access telephone able use independently . Prescribed diet would conflict low saturate fat ( e.g. , colectomy diet ) Have serious medical , psychiatric , cognitive disease would interfere participation ( e.g. , cancer undergo chemotherapy , psychotic disorder , Alzheimer 's disease , etc . ) If individual use Internet least week
